book.synopsis:
Conjugate verbs like a Italian
Most verb books offer little more than conjugation charts and a few mechanical exercises. Practice Makes Perfect: Italian Verb Tenses gives youmuch more. In addition to thorough demonstrations of conjugations for regular and irregular verbs, it features plenty of useful examples and numerous engaging exercises that help you remember verb tenses. And, equally important, it explains when and why to use them.
Two handy appendices (one listing conjugations and another matching verbs with their prepositions) make it easy for you to find the right words in Italian quickly.
book.title_long: Italian Verb Tenses (Practice Makes Perfect) (Italian and English Edition)
book.dimensions: Height: 11 Inches, Length: 8.25 Inches, Weight: 1.65 Pounds, Width: 0.75 Inches
